solution_line_template: Maria has ${saved_amount} and received ${mother_offer} from her mother. So she has {saved_amount} + {mother_offer} = $<<{saved_amount}+{mother_offer}={total_money_maria_has}>>{total_money_maria_has}.

As the price of the bike stands at ${bike_retail_price}, Maria needs {bike_retail_price} – {total_money_maria_has} = $<<{bike_retail_price}-{total_money_maria_has}={money_to_earn}>>{money_to_earn} more to buy the bike.
